sentence.Network_en: Objective: to approach the difference between traditional decoction gallipot and modern machine decoction.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 探讨传统药罐煎法与现代煎药机煎法的异同.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 陶字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 陶管〖 earthenwarepipe〗 陶罐〖 terrine;gallipot;stean〗 陶钧〖 potter'swheel〗.
gallery ①坑道，集水道 ②工作台gallipot 药罐gallium(abbr.Ga) 镓
...gallinaccan　① 家禽的；鹑鸡类的　② 鹑鸡类鸡〔指火鸡、野鸡、鹌鹑等〕gallipot　① 陶罐　② 海松树脂gallisin　（类）糊精物质

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: probably from galley + pot (because gallipots were brought from the Mediterranean in galleys)
